data.eml:eml: Pangio lidi, a new species of loach from eastern Borneo, Indonesia (Teleostei: Cobitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hadiaty, Renny Kurnia, Kottelat, Maurice (2009): Pangio lidi, a new species of loach from eastern Borneo, Indonesia (Teleostei: Cobitidae). Zootaxa 2171: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189202
